text: Abram Kryvosheiev was a middle-distance runner from Belarus. Abram competed in the 800 metres at the 1960 Summer Olympics and the 1964 Summer Olympics. He was born on November 12, 1933 and died in 2014.Abram Kryvosheiev ==References== Category:1933 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Belarusian sportspeople Category:Olympians for the Soviet Union Category:Middle-distance runners
title: Abram Kryvosheiev
